title: Hoy Gratis: Company of Heroes

embed.description: Experience the ultimate RTS WWII platform with the original COH2 and its standalone expansions: The Western Front Armies (multiplayer), Ardennes Assault (single-player) and The British Forces (multi-player). Multiplayer standalones (sold separately) allow you to play on any map against anyone owning any COH2 product.

body:
Se acuerdan que hace unos días tuvimos al World In Conflict en Uplay, también gratis ?
Ahora tenemos el Company of Heroes, que muchos de ustedes se acordaron durante ese post que hice. 
Así que, sin más preámbulos, un video para que se adentren si no lo conocen o tengan nostalgia y calienten motores los que vayan a descargarlo:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kS9JONoWyOE

El link es el mismo de arriba. Lo repito por las dudas

https://www.humblebundle.com/store/company-of-heroes-2

"Get it Free" y después van al carrito y los "compran" (es gratis claro )

Bueno, a disfrutar!

Edit: Requisitos:

> System Requirements
> 
> Minimum:
> 
> Windows
> Memory: 2GB RAM
> Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
> Graphics: 512MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 2900XT)
> OS: 32bit Vista
> Internet: Broadband Internet connection
> Hard Drive: 30GB free Hard disc space
> 
> OS X
> OS: OS X 10.10.3
> Processor: 1.8Ghz Intel
> RAM: 4GB
> Hard Disk: 35GB
> Graphics: 512MB (Nvidia 6xx series or later, AMD 7xxx series or later and Intel Iris Pro).
> Internet: Broadband Internet connection
> Input: Keyboard & Mouse
> 
> Linux
> OS: Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
> Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
> RAM: 4GB
> Hard Disk: 35GB
> Graphics: 1GB*
> Internet: Broadband Internet connection
> Input: Keyboard & Mouse
> *Requires an Intel Iris Pro graphics card or an NVIDIA 600 series graphics card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
> 
> Recommended:
> 
> Windows
> Memory: 4GB RAM
> Processor: 3Ghz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent
> Graphics: 1024 MB Direct3D 11 capable video card (GeForce GTX 470 or Radeon HD 5850)
> OS: 64bit Windows 7
> Internet: Broadband Internet connection
> Hard Drive: 30GB free Hard disc space
> 
> OS X
> OS: OS X 10.10.3
> Processor: 2.4Ghz Intel
> RAM: 8GB
> Hard Disk: 35GB
> Graphics: 4GB (Nvidia 780MX, AMD D700 or R9 295X)
> Internet: Broadband Internet connection
> Input: Keyboard & Mouse
> 
> Linux
> OS: Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
> Processor: 3.4 GHz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent.
> RAM: 8GB
> Hard Disk: 35GB
> Graphics: 4GB**
> Internet: Broadband Internet connection
> Input: Keyboard & Mouse
> **NVIDIA 760 series card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
> 
> Supported Languages: English, Czech, French, German, Italian, Polish, Russian, Spanish
>
